detaileddescription.para: The vector where all the blocks of the yard are stored.
The strategy for the choosing of the block to store a container there.
The value for the yard overflow: place where the containers can be stored if the yard is full.

memberdef.argsstring: (Model owner, String name, ChooseBlockYardStrategy s, boolean showInReport, boolean showInTrace)
memberdef.name: Yard

detaileddescription.para: Constructor for a Yard.

parameterdescription.para: desmoj.Model : The model this Yard is associated to.
java.lang.String : The Yard's name.
int : The Block's type. It can be only 0 - for export containers, 1- for import containers or 2 - mixed: for import and export containers.
long : The maximum capacity (TEU) of this Block.
boolean : Flag, if this Block should produce a report or not.
boolean : Flag for trace to produce trace messages.

detaileddescription.para: Returns a Reporter to produce a report about this Yard.

simplesect.para: desmoj.report.Reporter : The Reporter reporting about the statistics of this Yard.

detaileddescription.para: Method for producers to make the Yard add a block. This is only allowed as long as the Yard has not been used or the Yard has just been reset.

parameterdescription.para: Block : The Block that must be added to this yard.

detaileddescription.para: Gets all the blocks of the yard that have the certain typ.

parameterdescription.para: int : The typ of the blocks.

simplesect.para: Block[]: The Blocks of the yard of a certain typ.

detaileddescription.para: Gets all the blocks of a part of the yard that have the certain typ.

parameterdescription.para: int : The typ of the blocks.
Block[] : The array of the certain blocks of the yard.

simplesect.para: Block[]: The Blocks of the yard of a certain typ.

detaileddescription.para: Gets all the blocks of the yard that have some free place to store containers.

parameterdescription.para: long : The number of TEUs that are at least must be avalaible (free) in that blocks.

simplesect.para: Block[]: The Blocks of the yard that have some free place.

detaileddescription.para: Gets all the blocks from a part of the yard blocks that have some free place to store containers.

parameterdescription.para: Block[] : The array of the certain blocks of the yard.

simplesect.para: Block[]: The Blocks of the yard that have some free place.

detaileddescription.para: Gets all the blocks of the yard.

simplesect.para: Block[]: The Blocks of the yard.

detaileddescription.para: Gets the Block of the yard that was found by using the current yard strategy of the yard.

simplesect.para: Block: The Block of the yard found by using yard strategy.

detaileddescription.para: Method for producers to make the Yard store a number of n TEUs (a container) in its overflow part.

parameterdescription.para: long : The weight of the container to be stored in the overflow part of this yard. n must be positive.

detaileddescription.para: Method for consumers to retrieve from the overflow part of this Yard a number of n TEUs (a container).

parameterdescription.para: long : The weight of the container to be stored in the overflow part of this yard. n must be positive.

simplesect.para: boolean : Is true if the try was successfull, false otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: Method for producers to make the Yard store a number of n TEUs (a container). When the capacity of the yard can not hold the additional incoming TEUs the try to store will be refused.

parameterdescription.para: Block : The block of the yard to store.
long : The weight of the container to be stored in this Yard. n must be positive.

simplesect.para: boolean : Is true if the container can been stored successfully, false otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: Method for consumers to make the Yard retrieve a number of n TEUs (a container). When the yard is empty the try to retrieve will be refused.

simplesect.para: boolean : Is true if the container can been stored successfully, false otherwise.

parameterdescription.para: Block : The block of the yard to retrieve.
long : The weight of the container to be stored in this Yard. n must be positive.

detaileddescription.para: Gets the current number of TEUs/containers in the overflow part of this yard.

simplesect.para: long : The current capacity of te overflow part of the yard.

detaileddescription.para: Method to check if the Yard is free (there's at least one block that is free).

parameterdescription.para: long : The number of TEUs that are at least must be avalaible (free) in the Yard.

simplesect.para: boolean : Is true if the Yard is free, false otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: Method for producers to make the Yard reserve a number of n TEUs (a place for a container) to be stored there later. When the whole available capacity is already reserved the try to reserve will be refused.

parameterdescription.para: Block : The block of the yard to reserve.
long : The number of TEUs that are needed for a container to be stored in the Yard. n must be positive.

simplesect.para: boolean : Is true if a place for a container can been reserved successfully, false otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: Method for consumers to make the Yard plan a number of n TEUs (a place for a container) to be retrieved there later. When all the containers are already planed for the later retrieving the try to plan will be refused.

parameterdescription.para: Block : The block of the yard to plan.
long : The number of TEUs that a container that is in the Yard weights. n must be positive.

simplesect.para: boolean : Is true if a container can been planed successfully, false otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: Returns the number of all the blocks of this yard.

simplesect.para: int : The number of the yard blocks.

detaileddescription.para: Sets strategy of this yard for the choosing of a block to a new value.

parameterdescription.para: ChooseBlockYardStrategy : The new yard strategy.

detaileddescription.para: Returns the strategy of this yard for the choosing of a block.
To reset the statistics of this Yard. The statistics of all yard blocks will be reset too.
Gets all the blocks of the yard that are assigned a certain holding area to.

parameterdescription.para: HoldingArea: The holding area that the blocks are assigned to.

simplesect.para: Block[]: The Blocks of the yard of a certain holding area.

detaileddescription.para: Gets all the blocks of the yard with a certain container typ.

parameterdescription.para: int : The typ of the contaners of this block.

simplesect.para: Block[]: The Blocks of the yard of a certain container typ.

detaileddescription.para: Gets all the blocks of the yard that have at least some TEUs (not empty).

parameterdescription.para: long : The number of TEUs that are at least must be with containers in the blocks of the yard.

simplesect.para: Block[]: The Blocks of the yard that are not empty.

detaileddescription.para: Yard is the place where containers (or other kind of goods) can be stored by transpoters or cranes and retrieved by transporters or cranes. The yard consists of blocks. The storing in the Yard is possible using store(Block b) .With the retrieve(Block b) a container can be retrieved from the Yard. Yard is part of the composite design pattern as described in [Gamm97] page 163. Yard is derived from Block, which provides the functionality of the Block.

Block
